lines: Interesting bottle with a purple liquid...

andComment: A bottle with some strange liquid.
Today is clearly the 3rd. Justice is served.

lines: Outrageous! This calendar is lying to everyone!

andComment: A quite vague but effective calendar.
What's clear is that today is the 31th.
What's not is the year and the month.
That's truly innovative.

lines: That's a car, not a machine...
Moreover that's a toy car. You can't fit in.
Isn't this bigger on the inside?

andComment: A folder full of important documents.
Well. At least this is what the stamp over it says.
A memorable place.
Here I learned the limits of Vatican keyboards.
No negative numbers. So poetic.

lines: There are a lot of weird manuals here. Like...
It looks like it can't enter negative numbers...
How can I input '13 million years ago' in that machine?

andComment: Manuals. Manuals. Manuals.
A lot of books about human history.
And a sentai movie DVD.

lines: That's the machine you COULD PROBABLY use.
You can't use it because its owner is pretty possessive...
...and we need 1.21 jigowatts to make it work again.
What the hell is a jigowatt, Colin?
Why is there a baking-pan here?
I used it for my research.
Are you in chemistry now, Colin?
I... just cooked some muffins and...
...you know, I ate them while studying.
Ow. Okay. Okay. I got it.
A rocking horse with a 'Vatican keyboard' on it.
This rocking horse has a strange keyboard on it.
It looks just tied with some plastic handcuffs... anyway...
A toy horse tied with plastic handcuffs.
You can get into the saddle and rock...
...but all its wild and animal power is now harnessed.
Anyway I managed to setup the right coordinates.
I filled this thing fuel tank so energy shouldn't be a problem.
You have just to get into the saddle and say a voice command.
What a great piece of technology!
I hope he will find the stolen time machine...
And fix the mess the theft did in time...

andComment: Surprisingly enough, it's just an ordinary table.
Few muffins, crumbles and research papers.
Someone worked hard these days.

lines: The sun never lies. Today is the 3rd of the month.
It's been a long time since I didn't try to do it again.
Let's see if I'm rusty or not. Well.
The position of the sun in the sky...
Today is the 3rd of the month. Bingo.
Sun is shining, the weather is sweet.
Make you want to move your dancing feet.
To the rescue, here I am.
Want you to know ya, where I stand.
I've got good news and bad news. Which one do you want to hear?
My muffins didn't sink this time.
Your time machine isn't ready as I promised.
Your time machine isn't ready as I promised, but...
I purchased the striped tie I wear for you too.
TI IF MF EE ML AG CO HO ID NT EO BD RA OY-KEN!
Thank you for the report, Colin.
But I need to take photos of the Miocene epoch.
I have to use them for my lecture tomorrow.
I really need your time machine.
Is there something I can do?
Probably I seemed negative but that's a pretty easy problem.
The time machine is quite unstable...
Some parts are not working as designed...
I consumed all of the fuel units for testing...
I can't remember the precise date of the only supported jump...
If you can help me with this mess you'll have your photos in no time.
I don't think I've any other option.
I'll try to help you as much as I can.

choices: Why is there only a specific time?
Which part is not working as designed?

lines: The time machine works with mushroom-shaped units...
It's a funny shape. I liked it.
Time is mushroom-shaped and my machine can jump...
...only on the most curved part of this mushroom.
That's the top, so we must know it's exact year.
It's a funny shape. I liked it.
It's not mushroom-shaped. But it's a good idea.
Anyway, I used a particular keyboard I found around.
It was built in a little state I can't remember the name.
The manual should be around somewhere.

andComment: The number one trick worked. Why not trying another one?
The number one trick worked. Why not trying another one?
The number one trick worked. Why not trying another one?

lines: That means that is hot outside...
Dear Colin. I found these important papers...
Yeah. These are my studies about the shape of time.
Well. This page is quite important for using the time machine.
There are the right coordinates for the top of the time.
I bet that these mushroom-shaped muffins are the right fuel.
They fitted the plug in the mouth.
Some lights around the keyboard are blinking, so it probably worked.
I still can't configure the time machine.
Dear Colin, may I ask you a question?
Can you see the number one I sticked to the machine?
Yes. It's nice. I love the number one.
It looks like a little mushroom.
Anyway. It also looks like a minus so...
If I input the coordinates like this...
...it looks like a negative number, right?
Yes. That looks like a negative number from here.
Coordinates are read by a camera on the side...
Processed by a complex algorithm of computer vision...
So the machine will read the minus.
As I said, great idea Sas.
I understand that this game is missing audio...
But why have I to play effects with the voice?
Programmers are way too lazy these days.
The machine isn't ready and I'm terribly late on the schedule.
Probably I still have time for...

object.label: Stuff
object.interaction: Look at the stuff on table
